title: Phantom House
overview:
New Survival Horror!
About the GamePhantom House is a third-person survival horror game that plunges you into an abandoned house once home to dark rituals. Explore eerie halls, face unspeakable horrors, and rely on your wits and weapon to survive the unknown.About Phantom HousePhantom House is a third-person survival horror game that takes you into an abandoned house steeped in dark rituals. Explore eerie corridors, uncover hidden secrets, and brace yourself for the horrors lurking in the shadows.Key FeaturesWith limited resources, you’ll need to fight off relentless enemies, solve puzzles, and survive the unknown. Armed with only your gun and wits, discover the truth behind the house’s sinister past while navigating its chilling interiors and haunting grounds.
